SectionTypes.name: Default Section
SectionTypes.description: This is a default section type. If no specific section type used, then this would be used as a default section. Which can be rendered at anywhere on the page.

SectionTypes.name: Header Section
SectionTypes.description: This section will be rendered as a part of the header of the page.

SectionTypes.name: Main Section
SectionTypes.description: This section will be rendered as a part of main content of the page.

SectionTypes.name: Footer Section
SectionTypes.description: This section will be rendered as a part of the footer of the page.

ContentTypes.name: Rich Text Content
ContentTypes.description: This content will return a plain text or a HTML formatted contents to render.

ContentTypes.name: Hero banner
ContentTypes.description: This content will return a URL of hero banner.

ContentTypes.name: Hero banner carousel
ContentTypes.description: This content will return a list of hero banner URLs as a comm separated string.

ContentTypes.name: Product carousel
ContentTypes.description: This content will return a list of product IDs as a comma separated string.
